tool_description: Get current interest rates from all central banks and benchmarks. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/interestrate.
name: Interest Rate by API-Ninjas
title: Interest Rate by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/interestrate
api_list.description: API Ninjas Interest Rate API endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://interest-rate-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com/v1/interestrate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "interest-rate-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://interest-rate-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com/v1/interestrate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "interest-rate-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
